thread.title: Mexico sets May Maya price for international buyers

title: Mexico sets May Maya price for international buyers
text: April 11, 2018 / 6:58 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago Mexico sets May Maya price for international buyers Reuters Staff 2 Min Read MEXICO CITY, April 11 (Reuters) - Mexican state-owned oil company Pemex revised its May term pricing formulas for crude oil shipped to customers in the Americas, Europe and the Far East, the company said on Wednesday. The following table lists the adjustments to price constants in the Americas, the U.S. West Coast, Europe and the Far East: DESTINATION APRIL CONSTANT MAY CONSTANT AMERICAS Maya crude -3.30 -1.50 Isthmus crude +1.90 +3.80 Olmeca crude +3.25 +4.75 U.S WEST COAST Maya crude -3.40 -1.65 Isthmus crude +1.90 +3.80 EUROPE Maya crude -6.60 -5.65 Isthmus crude -2.40 -1.75 Olmeca crude -1.50 -0.50 FAR EAST Maya crude -9.20 -9.20 Isthmus crude -1.75 -1.65
